title: Tether’s circulating supply increased by 4.5 billion USDT in November
description:
The circulating supply of Tether’s USDT increased by 4.5 billion in November amid growing market optimism for a spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF). Blockchain intelligence platform Arkham confirmed this in a Nov. 28 post on X, noting that around $3 billion worth of USDT was minted on the Tron network. Notably, a Kraken deposit address, […]

The post Tether’s circulating supply increased by 4.5 billion USDT in November appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bloomberg Analyst Says Potential U.S. Approval of Multiple Spot Bitcoin ETFs in January 2024 Is Even More Likely After the SEC’s Latest Move
description: James Seyffart, an ETF Research Analyst at Bloomberg Intelligence, has provided insights suggesting that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) may be preparing to approve a series of applications for a spot market Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF) in January 2024. Seyffart shared his analysis in a detailed thread on the social media platform […]

title: Nigerian Supreme Court Extends Old Banknote Demonetization Deadline Again
description: The Supreme Court of Nigeria has again extended the lifespan of the N1000, N500, and N200 naira notes. The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) also reiterated that all banknotes, including the previously demonetized naira, remain legal tender “ad infinitum, even beyond the initial 31 December 2023, deadline” Demonetization Deadline Extended Again The Supreme Court of […]

title: Grayscale files pivotal prospectus, advancing Bitcoin ETF vision
description: In recent developments within the cryptocurrency sector, Grayscale, a leading crypto asset manager, has actively engaged with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to advance its plans for a spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF). This initiative marks a significant step in the evolving landscape of cryptocurrency investment vehicles. Grayscale revamps GBTC agreement, preps for ... Read more

title: The Dawn of a New Era: America’s AI-Enabled B-21 Raider
description: In the ever-evolving landscape of modern warfare, the United States has ushered in a new chapter by introducing the B-21 Raider, a state-of-the-art nuclear bomber. This aircraft is not just a leap in aviation technology; it represents a paradigm shift in military strategy owing to its integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI). The B-21 Raider: A ... title: TrueUSD Faces Depegging Amidst Controversies and Market Activity
description: In a surprising turn of events, the stability of TrueUSD (TUSD) experienced a significant dip, dropping to $0.995. This decline was triggered by several factors, including the resignation of Binance’s former CEO, Changpeng Zhao (CZ), and contentious statements suggesting that terrorists prefer Justin Sun’s Tron over Bitcoin for funding activities. title: Ripple’s XRP Enters the Smart Contract Arena: Flare Network’s Beta Testing Underway
description: The Flare Network has commenced private beta testing for its FAssets project, allowing assets like XRP, BTC, and DOGE to be utilized in smart contracts. Ripple has unlocked an additional 1 billion XRP from its escrow accounts in a routine procedure. Executed in three transactions, this move follows Ripple’s strategy of periodically releasing XRP. title: Buying Bitcoin with Strike: Simple Steps and Supported Countries
description:
